CustomField.description: Sept2018: To calculate Lead age from "Last User Modified" date to today’s date, formula moved from "NOW() - CreatedDate" to "NOW() - Last_User_Modified__c" Apr2018: To calculate Lead age from creation date to today’s date, formula moved from "NOW() - LastModifiedDate" to "NOW() - CreatedDate"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Lead Age calculated from "Last User Modified" date to today’s date
CustomField.label: DB Lead Age
